primaryOutcomeMeasure: To accelerate research into rare disorders by connecting individuals who are interested in research and who have been diagnosed with a rare disorder (or a disorder of unknown prevalence, or who are undiagnosed) with researchers who study rare diseases.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of a rare disease, a disease of unknown prevalence, undiagnosed or an unaffected carrier of a rare/uncommon disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of a disease which is not rare
